text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Cases of COVID-19 are spiking all over the country, but lets cram a bunch of people in an arena so that Trump can get his adulation fix between golf outing. Governing, you say, what's that? Reading the PDB? I don't have time for that, I have a tee time.
